blog.name: abeginningthatneverends
blog.title: a beginning that never ends
blog.description: Erlebe dein eigenes Abenteuer auf Hogwarts. Erstelle einen Charakter nach deinen Vorstellung, schlüpfe in die jeweilige Rolle und versetze dich ganz und gar in deine eigene Zeit in dem berühmten Internat für Hexerei und Zauberei namens Hogwarts.

summary: Twelve colours and everything comes together
title: Twelve colours and everything comes together
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PeQivs

by Stars_dreaming

When Helene Shacklebolt returns to Hogwarts for her Eight Year, she is surprised to see the Golden Trio there.

Slytherin is now the extremely unfavoured House. Helene and her friends need to keep watch over themselves every day in the corridors while hexes are thrown their way.
Being a Slytherin means being resourceful. Cunning. Clever. And most of all, fraternity and self-preservation.

Words: 211, Chapters: 1/14, Language: English

Series: Part 9 of Purebloods

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Original Female Character(s) of Color, Original Male Character(s) of Color, Kingsley Shacklebolt, Order of the Phoenix, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, James Potter, Lily Evans Potter
  • Relationships: Original Female Character/Harry Potter, Original Female Character & Blaise Zabini & Draco Malfoy & Pansy Parkinson, Blaise Zabini/Pansy Parkinson, Kingsley Shackebolt/Original Female Character, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Harry Potter & Hermione Granger & Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Sirius Black did not die, Neither did Fred Weasley, Hogwarts Eighth Year, Post-War, James and Lily lived as well, Peter?, who is he?, Remus did not marry Nymphadora, But Teddy does exist!, Marlene lived, So did Mary Mcdonald, And Dorcas too


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PeQivs

summary: Charmed Reboot (spoilers if you haven’t seen)
body:
Charmed Reboot (spoilers if you haven’t seen)

No. I’m sorry but no.


I watched the first episode and desperately tried to like it even a fraction but it was difficult with the cheesy, bad special effects of their “powers” - seriously, it’s 2018 and you couldn’t make the telekinesis more believable? -


And the house is so terribly dark inside and full of crap, it’s distracting!


What is up with the “white lighter” exit… is he from the wizarding world of Harry Potter with his Apparition instead of orbing.


Baking powder is a demon killer… WTF!


Why no “power of three will set you free” spell - just one sister reading something, holding hands… and why were their hands GLOWING during a spell?


And that first ice demon… what a lame demon - ice demon instead of water demon? I mean, really. They thought hard about that. And making him look like a White Walker from Game of Thrones…


I just can’t with the reboot.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

summary: The Vanishing of Amara Potter
title: The Vanishing of Amara Potter
description:
by LookBeyondReality

“I don’t understand. Why did you do this to me Marvolo?” The tears in her eyes were very real as she stared into his handsome smirking face. “You know why. Since the day I marked you as my equal you have belonged to me. And what an equal you are, my dear.”
Or: Amara Potter is kidnapped, and has to find a way to survive in this new environment.
FemHarry/TomRiddleJr past-non-con

summary:
Sirius Black  

aesthetic

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: (inspired by a tumblr post) Harry works at a shop that sells videogames and Tom works at a shop across the hall that...
body:
Prompt: (inspired by a tumblr post) Harry works at a shop that sells videogames and Tom works at a shop across the hall that sells suits. The two shops have an arrangement -  the videogame shop lets the suit guys use their lunchroom microwave, and in exchange the suit shop let the videogame guys use their bathroom. 

 Harry: “So for like three months now we just have these men in really nice suits come in and talk while using our microwave and teach them about nerdy shit? Then I, the goblin king in various shitty tee shirts and paint stained pants, walk into their super expensive store and just get greeted with ‘Yo dude what’s good?’ and talk about the pains of steaming silken dress shirts properly and it’s my favorite business interaction every day”

blog.name: hogwartshousefriends
blog.title: Hogwarts House Friends
blog.description: Greetings babes. I’m Anastasia. I have a special place in my heart for both Shakespeare and Harry Potter. Icon by @risuniku. If you need something tagged that I don't already tag let me know and I will do so.

summary:
Hufflepuff: May I get you anything to drink?
Slytherin: The tears of our enemies wrenched from their bodies as their bones are...
body:
Hufflepuff: May I get you anything to drink?

Slytherin: The tears of our enemies wrenched from their bodies as their bones are crushed.

Hufflepuff: I have jasmine tea.

Slytherin: Ooh, jasmine.

blog.name: antisocialpenguintalks
blog.title: Drarry lover
blog.description: Janessa. 19. Australia. her//she. Loooove drarry and memes :)

summary: Ideas for a ‘how they met series’
title: Ideas for a ‘how they met series’
body: Hello lovely people of the internet and drarry lovers alike!! I am planning to do a mini series on ao3 of everyone’s otp harry and draco! My idea is that every chapter will be a new scenario on how they met and I need some ideas from you guys as to what scenarios you would like to see our lovely boys meet in! You can comment directly on this post, reblog or shoot me a message in my inbox of your ideas and if I grab your idea and use it full credit will be given and I will even notify you of the chapter so you can give it a read if you want!!

trail.content: Hello lovely people of the internet and drarry lovers alike!! I am planning to do a mini series on ao3 of everyone’s otp harry and draco! My idea is that every chapter will be a new scenario on how they met and I need some ideas from you guys as to what scenarios you would like to see our lovely boys meet in! You can comment directly on this post, reblog or shoot me a message in my inbox of your ideas and if I grab your idea and use it full credit will be given and I will even notify you of the chapter so you can give it a read if you want!!
